sourcesContent: import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Menu, Responsive, Image, Grid, Button, Container } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { setAuthUser } from '../actions/authUser'; class Nav extends Component { handleLogout = e => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.setAuthUser(null); }; render() { const { authUser, users } = this.props; return ( Hello {users[authUser].name}
